lines.text: Faster than a rolling "O"! Stronger than silent "E"! Able to leap capital "T" in a single bound! It's a word, it's a plan, it's Letterman!
Stupid! Listen, stupid. I'm standing here, and I feel... stupid!
Who's the dummy writing this show?

[referring to Spider-Man]
He's so dumb he's trying to eat a hot dog with no mouth.
I can't swim. I can't swim. That's true, that's true, I can't swim a stroke. But as far as drowning is concerned you are looking at the king!

[speaking to Fargo, after being revealed as his impersonator]
Please don't be angry at me Mr. North, I've always admired you and wanted to be a great Decoder someday like you, but I needed a little practice.
lines.character: Buddy - Member of the Short Circus

lines.text: When it comes to decoding, I am the greatest!

[to Jim Boyd's character Lt. Krojak/ re Fargo North, Decoder]
Boss, you call this guy an expert? I've seen better heads on warts.
